subject: ProStyle 3000 stopped working - Warranty Claim
body:
Hello,

I purchased a ProStyle 3000 hair dryer on November 20, 2025 from Amazon. The order number is 112-4567890-1234567.

Last week, the dryer suddenly stopped working. When I turn it on, nothing happens - no heat, no fan, no lights. I've tried different outlets and it's definitely not a power issue.

I've been very careful with the dryer and only use it at home for personal use about 3 times a week.

The serial number is PS3K-2025-78542.

Please let me know how to proceed with a warranty claim.

Thank you,
Sarah Johnson
123 Oak Street
Austin, TX 78701
Phone: 512-555-0142

metadata.reason: Within warranty period, manufacturing defect, has proof of purchase
